title: Ritual: the collective psyche of Japan
brief_description: A Kaleidoscope of images of Japan, filmed mainly in Tokyo. The film shows a way of life based on rituals - community rituals, rituals of work and play, the psychic rituals of Zen and the martial rituals of the Samurai.
